text: The Disney Family Singalong is a series of American music television specials that were broadcast by ABC in 2020. It was first aired on April 16, 2020, and all hosted by Ryan Seacrest. The specials had performances of songs from Disney movies by musicians and other celebrity guests from their homes. The first special was seen by 10.3 million viewers. A second special—The Disney Family Singalong: Volume II—was aired on May 10, 2020, which was seen by 5.74 million viewers. This was followed by a Christmas-themed edition, The Disney Holiday Singalong, on November 30. ==References== Category:The Walt Disney Company
title: The Disney Family Singalong
